A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I loved the movie. The emotional depth was surprising.  This movie had the best acting I've seen in the Star Wars Saga from the 2 Skywalkers to date.

I cannot wait to see how that Luke\, Kylo and Rey relationship will evolve.  It's probably the 1st truly powerfully intense relationship we've seen in This saga.

I loved that Rey chose Light despite everything that happened to her and Ben fulfilling what Anikin wanted to achieve but didn't  - to be the most powerful ruler in the galaxy...

That casino scene could have been shortened but rest of movie\, the saner choreography & the spaces battles were beautifully crafted.

2019 seems an awfully Long wait to wrap up this arc!!
